attributes.action: Halt all Covid-19 vaccine roll outs to children under the age of 12
attributes.additional_details: Scientific evidence suggests that healthy children rarely develop serious illness from Covid-19 and now that the elderly and most vulnerable have been vaccinated, overall transmission is reduced. Long term safety data of the vaccines are unknown and emerging data now shows younger people are more likely to get side effects from Covid-19 vaccines. We as parents and guardians feel that it is unethical to administer these Covid-19 vaccines to healthy children under the age of 12.
attributes.background: Halt all Covid-19 vaccine roll outs to healthy U.K. children under the age of 12 based upon the scientific evidence that they rarely develop serious symptoms.

rejection.details:
The Government has not announced a vaccine roll-out for children.
